title: Kneading Love in the Hearthside Kitchen
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed, cinematic lighting, 16:9 aspect ratio, Modern Anime style, slice of life. A heartwarming scene of an elderly Japanese grandmother with silver hair tied in a neat bun, wearing a pink sweater and a flowered apron. She is smiling gently while kneading a large mound of dough on a wooden kitchen counter. The cozy, rustic kitchen features extensive wooden shelving with pottery and ingredients, a deep white sink, and a prominent red brick wood-fired oven glowing warmly in the background. A basket full of golden, freshly baked bread sits next to her. On a side table, a fluffy white cat sleeps soundly next to a steaming teacup. Sunlight streams through the large window overlooking a lush green garden. Soft, warm ambient light, detailed interior, domestic atmosphere, peaceful moment, aroma lines rising.
